title: Smart Lead Finder - No Duplicates
description: Automatically finds NEW companies every run - never scrapes the same company twice!

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: What type of businesses to find (e.g., 'tech companies', 'dental clinics', 'law firms')

location.title: Location
location.description: City, state, or country (e.g., 'New York', 'San Francisco, CA', 'London, UK')

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of NEW companies to find (will skip already-scraped ones)

skipDuplicates.title: Skip Previously Scraped Companies
skipDuplicates.description: If enabled, will never scrape the same company twice across all runs

targetIndustry.title: Filter by Industry (Optional)
targetIndustry.description: Only return companies in this specific industry

includeWebsiteData.title: Include Website Enrichment
includeWebsiteData.description: Visit websites to extract emails, decision makers, etc.
